org.hps.monitoring.application.model

Class SystemStatusTableModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
      • org.hps.monitoring.application.model.SystemStatusTableModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, TableModel, SystemStatusListener

    public final class SystemStatusTableModel
extends AbstractTableModel
implements SystemStatusListener
    A JTableModel that has a list of SystemStatus objects.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
